Class CashierModel

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.clients.cashierjavafx.CashierModel
public class CashierModel extends Object
Model class for the cashier interface. Handles business logic and updates the view through properties.

    • doCheck

      public void doCheck(String productNum)
      Checks the stock for the given product number. Updates the reply property with the product details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to check.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder(String productNum)
      Adds the product to the order. Updates the reply property with the basket details or an error message.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to add.

    • purchase

      public void purchase()
      Completes the purchase and resets the basket. Updates the reply property with the order number or an error message.

    • clearBasket

      public void clearBasket(boolean addStockBack)
      Clears the basket and optionally adds stock back to the database.
      Parameters:
      addStockBack - Whether to add stock back to the database.

    • removeLastItem

      public void removeLastItem()
      Removes the last item added to the basket. Updates the reply property with the basket details.

    • removeItemByProductNum

      public void removeItemByProductNum(String productNum)
      Removes a product from the basket by its product number. Updates the reply property with the basket details.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to remove.

    • getProductQuantityInBasket

      public int getProductQuantityInBasket(String productNum)
      Gets the quantity of a product in the basket by its product number.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to check.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the product in the basket.

    • removeQuantityFromBasket

      public void removeQuantityFromBasket(String productNum, int quantity)
      Removes a specified quantity of a product from the basket. Updates the reply property with the basket details.
      Parameters:
      productNum - The product number to remove.
      quantity - The quantity to remove.
